channel.title: Wtf?
channel.description:
When I trade my shops, I disconnect. Except one shop. It's Zeke in Al-Kharid. Before I turned him into a shop, trading him made you pickpocket him, get money and thieving xp. I changed it so he was a shop, and now my shops are messed up. I also added a teleport, which I took out, deleted the 2 shops I made, and my shops still didn't work.
PLEASE help me.
I would like to know how Zeke was before, cuz that made my server run. Now that he's a shop, it's all messed up. I just deleted the old Zeke out of my autospawn and added a new one. So it's prob his ID, which I'll try and change.
Thanks if you help.

item.title: Wtf?
item.dc:creator: @Sick_of_Air Sick of Air
item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

What source are you using?

Read full topic

When you did something in shops you deleted something and made it all out of order probably.

item.title: Wtf?
item.dc:creator: @Taylor_John0 Taylor John0
item.description:
@Taylor_John0 wrote:

Zeke’s a scimitar salesman in Al-Kharid. For some reason before you pickpocketed him when attempt to trade. That’s what I need to do so I can access my shops.

Read full topic

are they even men’t to be shops?
